_comment: Created by ianb on 01/10/2014 12:03:29 using v2.1
title: Did people feel they were listened to carefully?
analysis_commentary: The results to this question had changed very little between 2010 and 2013, the majority of people (over 78% in all years) felt they were definitely listened to carefully. However, in 2014 this had decreased to 73%, with those feeling they had been listened to 'to some extent' increasing to 21%. The proportion of those who didnâ€™t feel they were listened to carefully has increased from 3% in 2010 to 5% in 2014.
data_source: Care Quality Commission, Community Mental Health Survey
